page.title: 14REAVELEY FARM
page.content: Reavely is a tiny collection of houses and a farm.Until ten years ago the farm manager lived in the large farm house.His family now reside in what was the game-keepers cottage.The farm house has now been sold privately.There are also two semi-detached houses where the shepherd and farm worker live with their families.Apart from these houses there is nothing apart from old-style stone built farm buildings.A recent addition to the steading has been a large multi-purpose farm shed which is used for storage of crops such as hay and also for shelter of animals-such as ewes at lambing time.
